en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Shenzhen

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Shenzhen tomorrow morning (December 29) to attend the signing ceremony of the Arrangement on Mutual Taking of Evidence in Civil and Commercial Matters between the Courts of the Mainland and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (the Arrangement) with the Supreme People's Court.

The Arrangement aims at assisting litigants of the two jurisdictions to obtain evidence in civil and commercial matters under the current legal framework but with enhanced efficiency and greater certainty.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on the same day.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（十二月二十九日）上午訪問深圳，出席與最高人民法院簽署《關於內地與香港特別行政區法院就民商事案件相互委託提取證據的安排》（《安排》）的儀式。
該項《安排》旨在協助兩個司法管轄區的訴訟人在民商事案件中，能依據現行法律更有效率和明確地取得證據。
袁國強將於同日下午返回香港。

The Arrangement aims at assisting litigants of the two jurisdictions to obtain evidence in civil and commercial matters under the current legal framework but with enhanced efficiency and greater certainty.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon on the same day.
